do you know how to reset the panel icons: Do you know about the hidden folders in your /home/userName  folder?
what?
Go there in nautilus and choose view -> show hidden files
Any folder / file that starts with a "." will be hidden.
And for what I should do that?

All of those hidden files in your /home store your settings for all of your apps.  The gnome-panel is one of your apps.  If you delete one of those . folders then the settings for that app are erased and the next time the app starts the defaults are put there.
So figure out (using google) where the gnome-panel folder is (probably some where under .gnome2) and delete it!
Than re-start your gnome-panels

Awesome.  Good luck!
